creator: IZAM
descriptionHtml:
Daftra POS is a fast and flexible software meeting all retail and shop owners’ requirements to issue sales invoices through a unique and user-friendly interface that supports the Arabic language by default.

- Support for different Printer and Barcode devices.
- Support electronic scale .
- Supports adding products under different categories.
- Works offline with the ability to synchronize all sales Online.
- Works on the Internet from any device and any operating system.
- You can monitor the performance of many branches through one integrated system.
- Display products and categories with images with their description and search by the product’s name, ID, and Barcode.
- Multiple Payment Methods for customer satisfaction.
- Available in both Arabic and English.

Issue invoices including items and discounts and manage POS selling sessions through an integrated platform that supports various devices while you have access to your database of products, any time, anywhere.

The system fully supports scanning product barcodes and selling with different units of measurement, as well as products’ tracking system with expiry dates and serial numbers. And with integrating multiple payment methods, you are able to issue invoices and accept payments according to your customers’ preferred method.

Own the essential elements that allow you to manage a simple and functional POS software in one application; monitor the inventory of your sold items, track your cash movements in the cashier box or in your bank account and compare the balance of sales from your issued invoices with the amounts collected at the end of each POS selling session.

Easily manage refunds with a system that allows displaying the invoice details, specifying items to be returned, issuing the refund receipt, and instantly printing it out to the customer.
descriptionShort: POS Software for seamless Store POS Shift & Invoice Management.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fix some issues

- Fix an issue with barcode scanning for repeated products in multiple categories.
- Fix an issue with App upgrade behaviour.
- Fix white camera screen issue.

Easily manage refunds with a system that allows displaying the invoice details, specifying items to be returned, issuing the refund receipt, and instantly printing it out to the customer.
descriptionShort: POS Software for seamless Store POS Shift & Invoice Management.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fix some issues and improve performance.

title: Daftra POS - Point of Sales

creator: IZAM
descriptionHtml:
Daftra POS is a fast and flexible software meeting all retail and shop owners’ requirements to issue sales invoices through a unique and user-friendly interface that supports the Arabic language by default.

- Support for different Printer and Barcode devices.
- Support electronic scale .
- Supports adding products under different categories.
- Works offline with the ability to synchronize all sales Online.
- Works on the Internet from any device and any operating system.
- You can monitor the performance of many branches through one integrated system.
- Display products and categories with images with their description and search by the product’s name, ID, and Barcode.
- Multiple Payment Methods for customer satisfaction.
- Available in both Arabic and English.

Issue invoices including items and discounts and manage POS selling sessions through an integrated platform that supports various devices while you have access to your database of products, any time, anywhere.

The system fully supports scanning product barcodes and selling with different units of measurement, as well as products’ tracking system with expiry dates and serial numbers. And with integrating multiple payment methods, you are able to issue invoices and accept payments according to your customers’ preferred method.

Own the essential elements that allow you to manage a simple and functional POS software in one application; monitor the inventory of your sold items, track your cash movements in the cashier box or in your bank account and compare the balance of sales from your issued invoices with the amounts collected at the end of each POS selling session.

Easily manage refunds with a system that allows displaying the invoice details, specifying items to be returned, issuing the refund receipt, and instantly printing it out to the customer.
descriptionShort: POS Software for seamless Store POS Shift & Invoice Management.
